verses.verse: Children <WG5043>, obey <WG5219> <WG5720> your <WG5216> parents <WG1118> in <WG1722> the YY <WG2962>: for <WG1063> this <WG5124> is <WG2076> <WG5748> right <WG1342>.
Honour <WG5091> <WG5720> thy <WG4675> father <WG3962> and <WG2532> mother <WG3384>; (which <WG3748> is <WG2076> <WG5748> the first <WG4413> Mitzvah <WG1785> with <WG1722> promise <WG1860>;)
That <WG2443> it may be <WG1096> <WG5638> well <WG2095> with thee <WG4671>, and <WG2532> thou mayest <WG2071> <WG5704> live long <WG3118> on <WG1909> the earth <WG1093>.

And <WG2532>, ye fathers <WG3962>, provoke <WG3949> not <WG3361> your <WG5216> children <WG5043> to wrath <WG3949> <WG5720>: but <WG235> bring <WG1625> them <WG846> up <WG1625> <WG5720> in <WG1722> the nurture <WG3809> and <WG2532> admonition <WG3559> of the YY <WG2962>.

Servants <WG1401>, be `Ovedient <WG5219> <WG5720> to them that are your masters <WG2962> according to <WG2596> the flesh <WG4561>, with <WG3326> fear <WG5401> and <WG2532> trembling <WG5156>, in <WG1722> singleness <WG572> of your <WG5216> heart <WG2588>, as <WG5613> unto Moshiach <WG5547>;

Not <WG3361> with <WG2596> eyeservice <WG3787>, as <WG5613> menpleasers <WG441>; but <WG235> as <WG5613> the servants <WG1401> of Moshiach <WG5547>, doing <WG4160> <WG5723> the will <WG2307> of 'Elohim <WG2316> from <WG1537> the heart <WG5590>;
With <WG3326> good will <WG2133> doing service <WG1398> <WG5723>, as to the YY <WG2962>, and <WG2532> not <WG3756> to men <WG444>:

Knowing <WG1492> <WG5761> that <WG3754> whatsoever <WG3739> <WG1437> <WG5100> good thing <WG18> any man <WG1538> doeth <WG4160> <WG5661>, the same <WG5124> shall he receive <WG2865> <WG5695> of <WG3844> the YY <WG2962>, whether <WG1535> he be bond <WG1401> or <WG1535> free <WG1658>.

And <WG2532>, ye masters <WG2962>, do <WG4160> <WG5720> the same things <WG846> unto <WG4314> them <WG846>, forbearing <WG447> <WG5723> threatening <WG547>: knowing <WG1492> <WG5761> that <WG3754> your <WG5216> <WG846> Master <WG2962> also <WG2532> is <WG2076> <WG5748> in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772>; neither <WG2532> <WG3756> is there <WG2076> <WG5748> respect of persons <WG4382> with <WG3844> him <WG846>.
Finally <WG3063>, my <WG3450> brethren <WG80>, be strong <WG1743> <WG5744> in <WG1722> the YY <WG2962>, and <WG2532> in <WG1722> the power <WG2904> of his <WG846> might <WG2479>.

Put on <WG1746> <WG5669> the whole armour <WG3833> of 'Elohim <WG2316>, that <WG4314> ye <WG5209> may be able <WG1410> <WG5738> to stand <WG2476> <WG5629> against <WG4314> the wiles <WG3180> of the devil <WG1228>.

For <WG3754> we <WG2254> wrestle <WG3823> not <WG3756> against <WG2076> <WG5748> <WG4314> flesh <WG4561> and <WG2532> blood <WG129>, but <WG235> against <WG4314> principalities <WG746>, against <WG4314> powers <WG1849>, against <WG4314> the rulers <WG2888> of the darkness <WG4655> of this <WG5127> world <WG165>, against <WG4314> spiritual <WG4152> wickedness <WG4189> in <WG1722> high <WG2032> places.

Wherefore <WG1223> <WG5124> take unto you <WG353> <WG5628> the whole armour <WG3833> of 'Elohim <WG2316>, that <WG2443> ye may be able <WG1410> <WG5667> to withstand <WG436> <WG5629> in <WG1722> the evil <WG4190> day <WG2250>, and <WG2532> having done <WG2716> <WG5666> all <WG537>, to stand <WG2476> <WG5629>.

Stand <WG2476> <WG5628> therefore <WG3767>, having <WG4024> your <WG5216> loins <WG3751> girt about <WG4024> <WG5671> with <WG1722> truth <WG225>, and <WG2532> having on <WG1746> <WG5671> the breastplate <WG2382> of righteousness <WG1343>;
And <WG2532> your feet <WG4228> shod <WG5265> <WG5671> with <WG1722> the preparation <WG2091> of the gospel <WG2098> of peace <WG1515>;

Above <WG1909> all <WG3956>, taking <WG353> <WG5631> the shield <WG2375> of faith <WG4102>, wherewith <WG1722> <WG3739> ye shall be able <WG1410> <WG5695> to quench <WG4570> <WG5658> all <WG3956> the fiery <WG4448> <WG5772> darts <WG956> of the wicked <WG4190>.

And <WG2532> take <WG1209> <WG5663> the helmet <WG4030> of salvation <WG4992>, and <WG2532> the sword <WG3162> of the Spirit <WG4151>, which is <WG3603> <WG5748> the word <WG4487> of 'Elohim <WG2316>:

davvening <WG4336> <WG5740> always <WG1722> <WG2540> <WG3956> with <WG1223> all <WG3956> prayer <WG4335> and <WG2532> supplication <WG1162> in <WG1722> the Spirit <WG4151>, and <WG2532> watching <WG69> <WG5723> thereunto <WG1519> <WG5124> <WG846> with <WG1722> all <WG3956> perseverance <WG4343> and <WG2532> supplication <WG1162> for <WG4012> all <WG3956> saints <WG40>;

And <WG2532> for <WG5228> me <WG1700>, that <WG2443> utterance <WG3056> may be given <WG1325> <WG5684> unto me <WG3427>, that I may open <WG1722> <WG457> my <WG3450> mouth <WG4750> boldly <WG1722> <WG3954>, to make known <WG1107> <WG5658> the mystery <WG3466> of the gospel <WG2098>,

For <WG5228> which <WG3739> I am an ambassador <WG4243> <WG5719> in <WG1722> bonds <WG254>: that <WG2443> therein <WG1722> <WG846> I may speak boldly <WG3955> <WG5667>, as <WG5613> I <WG3165> ought <WG1163> <WG5748> to speak <WG2980> <WG5658>.

But <WG1161> that <WG2443> ye <WG5210> also <WG2532> may know <WG1492> <WG5762> my <WG1691> affairs <WG2596>, and how <WG5101> I do <WG4238> <WG5719>, Tychicus <WG5190>, a beloved <WG27> brother <WG80> and <WG2532> faithful <WG4103> minister <WG1249> in <WG1722> the YY <WG2962>, shall make known <WG1107> <WG5692> to you <WG5213> all things <WG3956>:

Whom <WG3739> I have sent <WG3992> <WG5656> unto <WG4314> you <WG5209> for <WG1519> the same <WG846> purpose <WG5124>, that <WG2443> ye might know <WG1097> <WG5632> our <WG2257> affairs <WG4012>, and <WG2532> that he might comfort <WG3870> <WG5661> your <WG5216> hearts <WG2588>.

Peace <WG1515> be to the brethren <WG80>, and <WG2532> love <WG26> with <WG3326> faith <WG4102>, from <WG575> 'Elohim <WG2316> the Father <WG3962> and <WG2532> the YY <WG2962> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>.

Grace <WG5485> be with <WG3326> all <WG3956> them that love <WG25> <WG5723> our <WG2257> YY <WG2962> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547> in <WG1722> sincerity <WG861>. Amen <WG281>. To <WG4314> the Ephesians <WG2180> written <WG1125> <WG5648> from <WG575> Rome <WG4516>, by <WG1223> Tychicus <WG5190>.
